group_1.textRight: *Sigh*...

group_1.textLeft: Have you calmed down a little?

group_1.textRight: Yes...I'm sorry...for troubling you...

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it.

group_1.textRight: ...And what is this place?

group_1.textLeft: It's one of the safehouses we've set up@near the cargo port.

group_1.textRight: Amazing...! You're just like real bodyguards!

group_1.textLeft: We ARE real buddyguards!

group_1.textRight: Ah, that's right. Sorry...

group_1.textLeft: ...Let's get this situation straight.
The interior structure of this offshoot Mirrors@is complex.
And there were more copies coming for us@than what we've seen in the original Mirrors...
If we're to launch a full-scale search,@we need more people.

group_1.textRight: But I really want to defeat the Witch,@right now...!

group_1.textLeft: We understand that, but...why are you@in such a hurry, Sae?
Do you wanna beat yesterday's you?!

group_1.textRight: ...It's nothing like that.

group_1.textLeft: ...If you continue to hide the real reason...
We won't be able to meet your expectations.

group_1.textRight: .........ter...in there...

group_1.textLeft: What...?

group_1.textRight: ...My little sister is in there...

group_1.textLeft: Your lil' sis...?

group_1.textRight: My sister lost her stuffed animal while she@was playing around here...
I've been searching for it with her, but...
Before I knew it, she'd wandered into@this Labyrinth...
I went inside the Labyrinth to bring her back,@but I couldn't find her.
I couldn't do anything about it anymore, so...@I called you guys.

group_1.textLeft: So that's what this is about...
Well, why didn't ya tell us you were@lookin' for your sister?!
I woulda done anythin' to help you find her!

group_1.textRight: I apologize for acting strange and hiding it.
I intended to rescue my sister on our way to@the Witch,
so I didn't think it would be necessary to tell you...
Please... Let's defeat the Witch quickly...!
I have to save my sister...!
I can understand why she's in such a hurry to@save her sister, but...
There's something a little off about this...

group_1.textLeft: It's true that she's impatient, but...it feels like@she's hiding her true feelings...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, that's how it feels to me, too...

group_1.textLeft: ...[wait:1.0][chara:302600:cheek_0][chara:302600:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json:eyeClose_1][chara:302600:lipSynch_1]No, we can't act like this.
We were just talking about believing in her,@since she's counting on us.

group_1.textRight: Ahaha... Yeah, you're right.
Sae's right! We gotta hurry up, Konoha!

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes, I agree.
I've already devised a plan.

group_1.textRight: Really...?!

group_1.textLeft: While Hazuki, Ayame, and I protect@each other's backs...
You stay in the center of our formation.
I want to avoid combat as much as possible,@so I'll take the lead and search for a route.

group_1.textRight: What should I do?!

group_1.textLeft: Only retaliate against the copies that attack you.@Protect yourself and Sae.

group_1.textRight: Got it!
Okay!
And, I will...?

group_1.textLeft: You'll keep an eye out for your sister.
You're the only one who knows what she@looks like, after all.

group_1.textRight: Okay..!
What if we reach the core area before@finding her sister?

group_1.textLeft: We'll defeat the Witch if we can.
If it proves too difficult...we'll retreat while@searching for her sister again.

group_1.textRight: ...Understood.
Konoha, Hazuki, Ayame...
I'm counting on you...!

group_1.textLeft: Yes, we'll definitely find your sister...!
